text: O Foxo is a village in north-western Spain. It is in the parish of Silleda, in Pontevedra, Galicia. In 2007, it had a population of 54 people, 26 of them were men and 28 were women. This represents a decrease in the number of people over the year 2000. It was also the former capital of the county. ==Bibliography== * == Other websites == * Silleda municipal web site * Silleda tourist web site Category:Province of Pontevedra
title: O Foxo, Silleda
